components/LPAboutContact/subtitle.defaultMessage: I'm not that hard to find, look:

components/LPAboutMe/p/1.defaultMessage: My name is Vinicius Pacheco and I'm a Full Stack developer and Designer with leadership experience. I combine design with my expertise in coding to transform complex problems into complete and elegant solutions. I'm fluent with Node.js, React and Typescript, and have some experience with Python and PHP. My greatest strengths are my learning speed and sensibility to hear. I always look for harmonizing functionality and elegancy.

components/LPAboutMe/p/3.defaultMessage: I grew up in Petrópolis, a small city in Rio de Janeiro. Things weren't so easy. Violence was normal and looking back I realize that I hardly felt heard. It was through coding that was able to express myself and find my voice at age 14. Later on, when I was 17, Atados contracted me as a freelancer to build their first international platform. So I moved to São Paulo, 286 miles from where I grew up.

components/LPAboutMe/p/4.defaultMessage: Inside Atados, I met all kinds of people. I formed great friendships for life, met sensible people that gave me the space to create and learnt the value of having empathic, vulnerable and true relationships.

components/LPAboutMe/p/5.defaultMessage: Learning how to be a better person helped me to build bridges instead of walls, to listen, to feel, to communicate and ask for help. I'm really happy to have worked here.

components/LPAboutMe/p/6.defaultMessage: I play cavaquinho, a Brazilian banjo, and tambourine. So playing samba in the street is my jam, but my favourite thing in the world is going to the beach. Whenever it's possible I take my surfboard with me. To be honest there are few adventures that I wouldn't jump into, especially those with boards. Skating? I got 2 - Let's do it!

components/LPAboutMe/title/2.defaultMessage: How I opened my heart to listen

components/LPAboutMe/title/3.defaultMessage: Oh, and I love to hangout

components/LPFooter/message.defaultMessage: I designed and developed this website in January 2021

components/LPHero/headline.defaultMessage: I code and design to make the world a better place

components/LPHero/subtitle.defaultMessage: Senior Dev. in love with art

components/LPKindWords/subtitle.defaultMessage: From people that worked with me

pages/index/contact.defaultMessage: Proposals, ideas and kind words are always welcome :)

project/financas/description.defaultMessage: Control your own personal finances through a simple, easy to use interface. For me, it was challenging to register and keeping track of all my personal expenses, so I decided to find an easier way to do it and prototyped this app.

project/financas/title.defaultMessage: Prototype: App for managing personal finances

project/pGraphQL/description.defaultMessage: Lexer, Parser and AST. A study to understand how languages are read and compiled.

whatsapp/hello.defaultMessage: Hi - I came through your portfolio

project/nexusTypeORMPlugin/description.defaultMessage: This plugin automatically creates GraphQL types and resolvers by transforming your TypeORM models into a GraphQL API

project/atados/description.defaultMessage: I worked at Atados as a Full Stack Developer, Designer and Tech Leader. For 1 year, I led a team of 4 developers to create impactful tech solutions in the social responsibility market. Our products were used by companies such as Samsung, Boticário and Via Varejo and our main product, a SASS web app, scaled to more than 150k users. Atados is the biggest independent volunteering platform in Brazil.

components/LPKindWords/daniel.defaultMessage: Vini was responsible for building and scaling the website Atados (www.atados.com.br). He managed our team for some years and with him, besides the creation of our platform with an easy to use interface for non-profit organizations, we also built a smart and scalable manageament system that enabled the technology team to be self sustainable for the first time. I hope that we can build more projects together in the future

components/LPKindWords/marcos.defaultMessage: Vinicius surprises anyone with his technical and manageament skills, an excellent professional. Deals with new challenges and problems like everyday steps, it's a professional that every needs.

components/LPKindWords/josias.defaultMessage: Vinícius is simply one of those people that is completely out of the curve. His skills to manage and developer evolve in way that amazes anyone. Definitly one of the best professionals that I've had the pleasure to work with.
